abstract: In one example, neuro-fuzzy expert system logic analyzes and assigns significance values to events occurring in a cloud infrastructure. The logic includes event significance logic and a plurality of neuro-fuzzy logic modules. Each of the logic modules includes fuzzy logic to determine a fuzzy value of an effect of a detected event on the cloud infrastructure. The event significance logic includes neuro-fuzzy logic to determine, based on the values of the effects of the detected event determined by the plurality of neuro-fuzzy logic modules, a value indicative of significance of the event to the cloud infrastructure.
